characters: Multiple pedestrians, including a child in a blue jacket and a man in a yellow shirt, are observed. The child is seen darting into the road from the right side, and the man is seen running across the road from the left side.
summary: The video sequence shows a vehicle driving at night in an urban area with street lights and shops on both sides. In the first set of frames, a child suddenly appears from the right side of the road, emerging from behind a parked vehicle, creating an immediate collision risk. In the second set of frames, a woman with a child suddenly appears from the left side of the road, emerging from behind a parked vehicle, creating another immediate collision risk. In the third set of frames, a man in a yellow shirt suddenly appears from the left side of the road, emerging from behind a parked vehicle, creating yet another immediate collision risk.
actions: The child on the right side of the road suddenly runs into the driving lane. The woman with a child on the left side of the road suddenly runs into the driving lane. The man in a yellow shirt on the left side of the road suddenly runs into the driving lane.
key_objects: Parked vehicles on both sides of the road, street lights, shops, and pedestrians.
